function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of monitoring the effectiveness of prevention and mitigation measures during a crisis","Impact":"Ineffective response to the pandemic and its effects on different population groups","Mitigation":"Implementing a robust monitoring system and regular assessments of the effectiveness of prevention and mitigation measures","Technologies":"Data analytics, remote monitoring technology","People":"Population groups affected by the pandemic","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited capacity for evidence-informed policy-making in middle-income countries","Impact":"Inability to bridge the gap between science, policy, and politics, leading to ineffective policy outcomes","Mitigation":"Building institutional capacities for evidence-informed policy-making, advocating and influencing policy outcomes","Technologies":"Knowledge translation platforms, data visualization tools","People":"Policy-makers, stakeholders, civil society organizations, media","Owner":"Knowledge to Policy (K2P) Center, WHO Collaborating Centre"},{"Description":"Lack of trust in evidence and critical linkages between stakeholders","Impact":"Undermining the importance of evidence in decision-making and response efforts","Mitigation":"Building trust, establishing critical linkages, raising demand for evidence","Technologies":"Communication platforms, knowledge sharing tools","People":"Policy-makers, stakeholders, civil society organizations, media","Owner":"Knowledge to Policy (K2P) Center, WHO Collaborating Centre"}]}
